subject: Nascar Sprint Cup Series
Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: First, Brad Keselowski became a Nascar star on Twitter, and then he became a star on the track, winning his first Sprint Cup championship last Sunday.
snippet: First, Brad Keselowski became a Nascar star on Twitter, and then he became a star on the track, winning his first Sprint Cup championship last Sunday.
